data.title: Hotel Alpina - Teresopolis, BR Meeting Venues and Event Space
data.meta_description: The Hotel Alpina is one of the most traditional hotels in the mountain region. Surrounded by natural beauty and privileged by the mountain climate, is located in a prime area of the city of Teresopolis, which is only 110 km from Rio de Janeiro.
data.text:
More

The Hotel Alpina is one of the most traditional hotels in the mountain region. Surrounded by natural beauty and privileged by the mountain climate, is located in a prime area of the city of Teresopolis, which is only 110 km from Rio de Janeiro. Our hotel offers uniquely decorated sleep rooms for guests and also includes many amenities to make their stay comfortable.
